defaultLocale.name: Shield Recipe Client
defaultLocale.description: Client to download and run recipes for SHIELD, Heartbeat, etc.

defaultLocale.name: Activity Stream
defaultLocale.description: A rich visual history feed and a reimagined home page make it easier than ever to find exactly what you're looking for in Firefox.

defaultLocale.name: Multi-process staged rollout
defaultLocale.description: Staged rollout of Firefox multi-process feature.

defaultLocale.name: Application Update Service Helper
defaultLocale.description: Sets value(s) in the update url based on custom checks.

defaultLocale.name: Pocket
defaultLocale.description: When you find something you want to view later, put it in Pocket.

defaultLocale.name: Web Compat
defaultLocale.description: Urgent post-release fixes for web compatibility.

defaultLocale.name: NoScript
defaultLocale.description: Extra protection for your Firefox: NoScript allows JavaScript, Java (and other plugins) only for trusted domains of your choice (e.g. your home-banking web site). This whitelist based pre-emptive blocking approach  prevents exploitation of security vulnerabilities (known and even unknown!) with no loss of functionality... Experts will agree: Firefox is really safer with NoScript :-)
defaultLocale.creator: Giorgio Maone
contributors: Alexander Sokolov, Sergei Smirnov and negodnik (Russian translation)
Batuhan Çetin, Volkan Gezer and eveterinary (Turkish translation)
Drive DRKA and Dzmitry Drazdou (Belarusian translation)
Engin Yazılan, Erkan Kaplan & Fathi  (Turkish translation)
X.F Mao & George C. Tsoi (Simplified Chinese)

defaultLocale.name: uBlock Origin
defaultLocale.description: Finally, an efficient blocker. Easy on CPU and memory.
defaultLocale.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: وأخيراً, مانع اعلانات كفوء. خفيف على المعالج و الذاكرة.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Най-накрая, ефективен рекламен блокер с малки изисквания за процесор и памет.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: অবশেষে, একটি কার্যকর বিজ্ঞাপন প্রতিরোধক। সিপিইউ এবং মেমরি সহায়ক।
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalment, un blocador eficient que utilitza pocs recursos de memòria i processador.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konečně efektivní blokovač, který nezatěžuje CPU a paměť.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Тинех Интернет тишкерӳҫӗ валли хӑвӑрт та витӗмлӗ чаркӑч пур.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endelig en effektiv blocker til Chromium-baserede browsere. Lavt CPU- og hukommelsesbrug.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endlich ein effizienter Blocker. Prozessor-freundlich und bescheiden beim Speicherbedarf.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Επιτέλους, ένας αποτελεσματικός blocker. Ελαφρύς για τον επεξεργαστή και τη μνήμη.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finfine rendimenta reklamoblokilo. Afabla por ĉefprocesoro kaj memoro.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Por fin, un bloqueador eficiente con uso mínimo de procesador y memoria.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Lõpuks on valminud tõhus blokeerija. Protsessori- ja mälusõbralik.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Behingoz, blokeatzaile eraginkor bat. PUZ eta memorian arina.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: بالاخره، یک بلاکر کارآمد. کم حجم بر روی پردازنده و حافظه.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Viimeinkin tehokas ja kevyt mainosten estäjä.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Sa wakas! Isang magaling na blocker para sa Chromium-based browsers. Magaan sa CPU at memory.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Un bloqueur de nuisances efficace, qui ménagera votre processeur et votre mémoire vive.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Einlik, in effisjinte adblocker. Brûkt hast gjin prosessorkrêft of ûnthâld.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Ó fin, un bloqueador eficiente que non chupa toda a memoria e o procesador.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: סוף סוף, חוסם יעיל. קל על המעבד והזיכרון.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: आख़िरकार, क्रोमियम-बेस्ड ब्राउज़रों के लिए एक कुशल अवरोधक। CPU और स्मृति पर आसान।
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konačno, efikasan blokator. Lak na CPU i memoriji.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Végre egy hatékony reklám- és követésblokkoló böngészőkhöz, amely kíméletes a processzorral és a memóriával.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Akhirnya, pemblokir iklan yang efisien. Ringan penggunaan CPU dan memori.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, un blocker efficiente. Leggero sulla CPU e sulla memoria.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 高効率ブロッカーが遂に登場。CPUとメモリーの負担を抑えます。
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: როგორც იქნა, ეფექტური მბლოკავი. ზოგავს CPU-ს და მეხსიერებას.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: ಕೊನೆಗೂ, ಒಂದು ದಕ್ಷ ನಿರ್ಬಂಧಕ. ಮಿತವಾದ ಸಿಪಿಯೂ ಹಾಗು ಮೆಮೊರಿ ಬಳಕೆ.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 이 부가 기능은 효율적인 차단기입니다. CPU와 메모리에 주는 부담이 적습니다.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Pagaliau, efektyvus blokatorius, neapkraunantis nei procesoriaus, nei darbinės atminties.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Beidzot, efektīvs bloķētājs. Nepārslogo procesoru un atmiņu.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: അവസാനം, ഒരു കാര്യക്ഷമമായ ബ്ലോക്കര്‍. ലഘുവായ CPU, memory ഉപയോഗം.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: शेवटी, एक कार्यक्षम ब्लॉकर क्रोमियम आधारित ब्राउझरांसाठी. सीपीयू आणि मेमरी वर सोपे जातो.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Endelig en effektiv blokkeringsutvidelse. Lavt CPU- og minnebruk.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Eindelijk, een efficiënte adblocker. Gebruikt weinig processorkracht en geheugen.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Nareszcie skuteczne blokowanie reklam, niskie użycie procesora i pamięci.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, um bloqueador eficiente. Com baixo uso de memória e CPU.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Finalmente, um bloqueador eficiente. Leve na CPU e memória.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: În sfârșit, un blocant eficient. Are un impact mic asupra procesorului și memoriei.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Наконец-то, быстрый и эффективный блокировщик для браузеров.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Konečne efektívny blokovač, ktorý nezaťažuje CPU a pamäť.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Končno, učinkovita, procesorju in pomnilniku prijazna razširitev za blokiranje oglasov.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Më në fund, një bllokues efikas që nuk e rëndon procesorin dhe memorjen.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Коначно, ефикасан блокатор. Ниски процесорски и меморијски захтеви.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Äntligen, en effektiv blockerare. Lätt på processor och minne.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: இறுதியாக, ஒரு திறமையான விளம்பரத் தடுப்பான். கணினியின் மையச் செயற்பகுதியின் மேலும் நினைவகத்தின் மேலும் இலகுவானது.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: మొత్తానికి RAM ఇంకా CPU పై తేలికయిన, ఒక సమర్థవంతమైన నిరోధిని.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Sonunda, etkili bir engelleyici. İşlemci ve belleği yormaz.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Ефективний блокувальник реклами таки з’явився. Не навантажує процесор та пам'ять.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Cuối cùng, đã có một công cụ chặn quảng cáo hiệu quả, tiêu tốn ít CPU và bộ nhớ.
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 一款高效的网络请求过滤工具，占用极低的内存和 CPU。
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 終於出現了，一個高效率的阻擋器，使用不多的 CPU 及記憶體資源。
locales.creator: All uBlock Origin contributors

defaultLocale.name: User Agent Switcher
defaultLocale.description: Adds a menu and a toolbar button to switch the user agent of a browser.
defaultLocale.creator: Chris Pederick

defaultLocale.name: Privacy Badger
defaultLocale.description: Privacy Badger protects you from trackers as you surf the web!
defaultLocale.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger protects you from trackers as you surf the web!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Personvernsgrevlingen
locales.description: Personvernsgrevlingen beskytter deg fra sporere når du surfer på nettet!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger vous protège des traqueurs lorsque vous surfez sur le web !
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger те защитава от преследвачи, докато сърфираш в интернет!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger skyddar dig mot spårare när du surfar på nätet!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger vás chrání před sledováním při procházení internetu!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger захищає вас від стеження поки ви переглядаєте сторінки в Інтернеті!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privata Melo
locales.description: Privata Melo protektas vin kontraŭ spuriloj dum kiam vi retumas!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger ti protegge dai tracker mentre navighi in rete!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger schützt Sie vor Trackern während Sie im Web surfen!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: 隐私獾
locales.description: 你在网上冲浪的时候，隐私獾会保护你免受跟踪器的烦恼！
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger вас штити од праћења док прегледате веб!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger защищает вас от трекеров во время работы в Интернете!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger chroni Cię przed szpiegami podczas gdy Ty przeglądasz Sieć!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: ¡Privacy Badger te protege de rastreadores mientras surfeas por la web!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: 您在網上衝浪的時候，Privacy Badger 會保護您免於被追蹤器追蹤的煩惱！
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger beskytter dig fra sporinger mens du surfer på nettet!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: Privacy Badger
locales.description: Privacy Badger geeft u meer controle over het gevolgd worden op internet!
locales.creator: privacybadger-owner@eff.org

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: അവസാനം, ഒരു കാര്യക്ഷമമായ ബ്ലോക്കര്‍. ലഘുവായ CPU, memory ഉപയോഗം.

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: 一款高效的网络请求过滤工具，占用极低的内存和 CPU。

locales.name: uBlock Origin

locales.name: uBlock Origin

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Končno, učinkovita, procesorju in pomnilniku prijazna razširitev za blokiranje oglasov.

locales.name: uBlock Origin

locales.name: uBlock Origin
locales.description: Sa wakas! Isang magaling na blocker para sa Chromium-based browsers. Magaan sa CPU at memory.

defaultLocale.name: NoScript
defaultLocale.description: Extra protection for your Firefox: NoScript allows JavaScript, Flash (and other plugins) only for trusted domains of your choice (e.g. your home-banking web site). This whitelist based pre-emptive blocking approach prevents exploitation of security vulnerabilities (known and even unknown!) with no loss of functionality… Experts will agree: Firefox is really safer with NoScript :-)

locales.name: NoScript
locales.description: Extra protection for your Firefox: NoScript allows JavaScript, Flash (and other plugins) only for trusted domains of your choice (e.g. your home-banking web site). This whitelist based pre-emptive blocking approach prevents exploitation of security vulnerabilities (known and even unknown!) with no loss of functionality… Experts will agree: Firefox is really safer with NoScript :-)
